zapier.title: Zapier
zapier.subtitle: Connect Landbot with 4000+ apps and automate workflows.

about.title: About this integration
contents: Zapier is a user-friendly web service that allows you to connect commonly used web apps and automate actions between them. Connecting Landbot with Zapier allows you to select Landbot from your list of triggers during the creation of a Zap and unlock a new realm of automation.
This integration will enable you to perform tasks such as exporting/importing data, sending notifications, analyzing inputs, and more.Popular ways to use Landbot and Zapier:
listText: Add a row to a Google Sheets spreadsheet from new Landbot responses;
Add new Landbot submissions to a MailChimp list;
Create Trello cards from new Landbot entries;
Add or update HubSpot CRM contacts for new submissions on Landbot;
Send emails through Gmail for new entries on Landbot.

keyFeatures.title: Key features
checkBoxs: Trigger - when a visitor reaches the Zapier Integration block within a bot

webflow.title: Webflow
webflow.subtitle: Integrate your chatbot in a Webflow website.

about.title: About this integration
contents: Generate leads and improve the customer experience on your Webflow website with Landbot.
By adding a chatbot to your website, you can:
To install a chatbot on Webflow, you first must create one. With Landbot's powerful platform and visual drag & drop interface, you can launch your chatbot in minutes.
Use one of our chatbot design templates or completely customize the look and feel of the chatbot to match your Webflow design.
listText: Convert website traffic in real-time and increase your revenue.
